name: Pumpkin-Shooter
description:
Welcome to Pumpkin Shooter!!

 My garden has been infected by a virus that makes pumpkins go evil. Please save my garden by shooting every last evil pumpkin on my farm ♥.

Also, keep in mind that the evil pumpkins are poisonous to humans. Make sure to stay away because when they touch you, you die.

Good luck friend. I hope you save my farm. I will be in your debt for this help.

Your friend,

Farmer.
